battlelog_header: {0} is having a one on one meeting with {1}.

sheet_no_character: You have no clone working here.
battlelog_critical_roll: {0} presents an incredibly valid point that can not be ignored!

battlelog_attack_roll: *{0}* would like to make a point. They create a {1} bullet point slide, then add {2} GIFs for a total slide power of {3}. *{4}* finds {5} of the bullets points meaningless.

reward_help_description: Also, you can give out rewards to other players/clones. To give a reward:
